description: This file defines an interface IController as part of the WPEFramework plugin system. It declares a set of methods for controlling and managing plugins or modules, including persist, delete, reboot, environment retrieval, configuration handling, and cloning. The interface is intended to be implemented by classes managing plugin/developer interactions within the framework.

classes.name: IController
classes.description: An interface representing a controller with methods for managing plugin lifecycle, configuration, and environment.

methods.name: Persist
methods.description: Persists the current state or configuration.

methods.name: Delete
methods.description: Deletes a resource or plugin specified by path.

methods.name: Environment
methods.description: Retrieves environment details for a given index.

methods.name: Configuration
methods.description: Retrieves or sets configuration for a plugin identified by callsign.

methods.name: Clone
methods.description: Creates a clone of a plugin from a base callsign to a new callsign.

ctags.name: IController
ctags.pattern: /^struct DEPRECATED EXTERNAL IController : public virtual Core::IUnknown {$/
